choices: You enter as Ted calls out to from another room!
Ted is running down the stairs ready to greet you!
Ted has stolen the keys and hid them down his..
Ted is upstairs in his room playing..
1.content:
It was a warm summer day with no clouds to be seen for miles. You feel the hot air brush against your skin as you pedal across the road and hop up on the roasting sidewalk. You didn't usually mind the warm weather, but you did admit to yourself that today was really hot, good thing you packed some sunscreen before you left.
As you zoom across the hot surface of the sidewalk you clear an empty road and make a small hop to continue cycling.

You looked forward to today, the Robinson family had been desperate for a babysitter for a while and by a stroke of luck they knew your parents and before you knew it you found yourself to be babysitting for the weekend.

You feel the terrain change from asphalt to dirt and then grass as you take a shortcut though what would technically be someones back garden, but you didn't care much knowing that you cycle faster than they run.

You see their house in the distance as their car pull out from the driveway and head off. They already told you that the door would be unlocked with a pair of keys hidden on a shelf in the kitchen, together with a note on when to make dinner, go to bed and where the snacks were hidden, as well as the password for the TV.

You park your bike in front of their house, grab your water bottle and open the door.
1.title: A weekend to remember

choices: You were babysitting a enormously hung futanari girl instead
15.content: Here is some more choices for ya!
15.title: More choices

info.brief_description: You get more than you bargained for when babysitting a kid with more than meets the eye
info.description: it's a bright and sunny Friday afternoon. Having just gotten off the phone with your neighbours, it turns out they had to leave for the weekend early. You grab your backpack filled with bits and bobs, kiss your mom goodbye and get on your bike and head over to babysit their nine year old son for the weekend.
